whatIs.title: What is CryptoDiac?
whatIs.body:
CryptoDiac is a set of collectible characters uniquely designed based on the 12 western zodiac signs. Each sign has 12 different colors, so there are only 144 CryptoDiac in the world!

CryptoDiac is a Non-Fungible Token (NFT) and stored on the Ethereum blockchain. You can purchase and own one via Opensea.io.

aboutDesign.title: About the design
aboutDesign.body:
The 12 characters are astrological signs: Aries, Taurus, Gemini, Cancer, Leo, Virgo, Libra, Scorpio, Sagittarius, Capricorn, Aquarius, and Pisces.

Each sign has four unique items that bring happiness to the owner’s life in four different aspects.

And lastly, you can choose from 12 different colors. In many Asian cultures, people believe in the effects of colors on a person’s life.

collections.title: Collections
collections.body:
Only one color per zodiac sign will be released at a time.
Once the purchase is complete, the next one will be released according to the color sequence.
